The game used to be great, until they made it free to play. Now there were hackers in the past but there was maybe one every ten games. Now there's at least 3 in every lobby, not to mention the whole prime thing is bullsh1t. If i reviewed this game in 2015 it would've been a 10/10 because of how fun and competitive it was but now its sh*t. If you love cancer and/or aids this games for you. Otherwise have fun being told by an 11 year old with aimbot that you're a n****r.
